channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What we know about the midair crash near Washington, D.C.
item.description: Authorities believe there were no survivors in the accident, which happened as a regional passenger jet was attempting to land Wednesday night at Rona...

item.title: Watch Live: Tulsi Gabbard confirmation hearing for director of national intelligence
item.description: President Trump's pick to lead the intelligence community is one of the most vulnerable nominees.

item.title: South Africa and Rwanda go head-to-head over DR Congo war
item.description: Rwanda says South Africa is in “no position to take on the role of a peacemaker or mediator” in DR Congo.

item.title: Watch Live: Kash Patel confirmation hearing for FBI director
item.description: President Trump has nominated Kash Patel to serve as FBI director. He is appearing before the Senate Judiciary Committee for his confirmation hearing.

item.title: Recipient of pig kidney transplant reaches a milestone
item.description: An Alabama grandmother who was the first patient to receive a new kind of genetically modified pig kidney more than two months ago is now the longest ...

item.title: Virginia Senator Tim Kaine reflects on air travel safety following mid-air collision in Washington, D.C.
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep talks with Democratic Sen. Tim Kaine of Virginia about airport and air travel safety following the mid-air collision near D.C.'s c...

item.title: Trump speaks about D.C. plane crash, points blame at DEI
item.description: President Trump delivered remarks Thursday morning in the aftermath of the first major commercial plane crash in the U.S. in more than a decade.

item.title: U.S. and Russian figure skaters are among the victims of the D.C.-area plane crash
item.description: At least a dozen figure skaters, coaches and their family members were on the plane that crashed near Washington, D.C., including two teenage competit...

item.title: Plane, Black Hawk helicopter collide near D.C. And, Trump's plans for Guantánamo
item.description: An American Airlines plane and a Black Hawk helicopter collided near Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport last night. And, President Trump plans ...

item.title: US and Russian figure skaters were on board crashed plane
item.description: They include two teenagers, their mothers and two former Russian stars, according to their club in Boston.

item.title: Man who burned Quran 'shot dead in Sweden'
item.description: Salwan Momika, 38, is reported to have been killed in an apartment in Södertälje, Stockholm.

item.title: Merkel criticises her party leader after far-right vote
item.description: The former chancellor's comments come after the CDU put forward a proposal which was supported by the far-right AfD.

item.title: Everyone aboard an American Airlines jet that collided with an Army helicopter is feared dead
Democratic party needs to focus on taking on Trump, being less "rigid," DNC chief says
item.description: Democratic National Committee Chairman Jaime Harrison is about to depart his position atop the losing party in the 2024 presidential election. Harriso...

item.title: Who is Sean Duffy, the public face of the federal government’s response to the DC plane crash?
item.description: Sean Duffy, the new transportation secretary, was facing his first major crisis just hours after being sworn in for the job.

item.title: Day 2 of RFK Jr. confirmation hearings kick off in Senate
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is back on Capitol Hill for a hearing before the Senate Health, Education, Labor and Pensions committee.

item.title: What we know so far about Washington DC plane crash
item.description: The aircraft collided with a military helicopter that was on a training flight as it approached the runway.

item.title: 2 teens from a Boston skating club, their mothers, and coaches among passengers on downed flight
